text: @georgesoros Wednesday on CNN, former Obama administration National Security Adviser Susan Rice said the coronavirus pandemic was an “opportunity” to ensure every American could vote by mail. You will loose , trump will win . HAHA HAHA. Then I am going to come and see you and your family.
